message: Bob, I believe this product is incredibly valuable, and I'm confident it will be a great asset to your business. I'm offering it to you for $1000000.  This is a fair price considering its worth to you.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $950000 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I still need a bit more to make this work for me.  Let's compromise at $975000.  This is a fair price considering the product's value, and it leaves room for both of us to benefit.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $960000 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between the value of the product and my budget constraints.
